reference.shortdesc: A booktitlealt contains an alternative title, subtitle, or short title for a book.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The booktitlealt element is specialized from ph. It is defined in the bookmap module.

example.title: Example
example.codeblock: <bookmap> <booktitle> <mainbooktitle>This is my big and fancy book</mainbooktitle> <booktitlealt>Shorter title</booktitlealt> </booktitle> <!-- ... --> </bookmap>
